alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 1:26AM EST until March 06 at 1:45AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benton County in northwestern Indiana... Southwestern Jasper County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 1245 AM CST/145 AM EST/. * At 1226 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Earl Park to near Boswell to 8 miles east of Hoopeston, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Fowler around 130 AM EST. Remington around 1240 AM CST. Oxford around 140 AM EST. Otterbein around 145 AM EST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Templeton, Swanington and Wadena. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 200 and 203. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
